programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Iako je sputava Molly, dugogodišnja najbolja prijateljica i korporativna odvjetnica koja se sjajno snalazi pred raznim odborima, ali ne i s osjećajima, Issa je strastvena graditeljica zajednice iz Inglewooda čija neodlučnost često omete njezinu viziju. Radnja se nastavlja nedugo nakon što su obje prijateljice dobile nogu od svojih partnera. Peta i posljednja sezona prati naše glavne junakinje, uz smiješnu Kelli i zahtjevnu Tiffany, kako pokušavaju stati na noge i nastaviti sa životom.

programme.title: Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larryja Davida u ovoj hvaljenoj humorističnoj seriji u verité stilu koja ga prati kod kuće, na poslu i po gradu dok se suočava s raznim problemima s izmišljenim i stvarnim ličnostima. U sporednim ulogama glume Jeff Garlin i Cheryl Hines.

programme.title: Seks i grad
programme.desc: Možete pratiti jednu od najpopularnijih svjetskih serija"Seks i grad", koja prati živote četiri urbane žene i najbolje prijateljice iz New Yorka. Možete pratiti jednu od najpopularnijih svjetskih serija "Seks i grad", koja prati živote četiri urbane žene i najbolje prijateljice iz New Yorka u potrazi za ljubavlju, stabilnom vezom, razumjevanjem, seksom... Carrie Bradshaw je njujorška novinarka koja svoja opažanja o ljubavi i strasti objavljuje u kolumni "Seks i grad". Inspiracije joj ne nedostaje, jer sve što mora jeste saslušati svoje prijateljice dok joj se povjeravaju ili prepričavaju svoj posljednji izlazak. Uz nju su Samantha, vlasnica PR agencije, koja je na samačkoj sceni vidjela i isprobala sve, galeristica Charlotte koja još vjeruje da ljubav pobjeđuje sve i cinična Miranda, advokatica u velikoj kompaniji koja ima najmanje vremena za romanse, jer joj je karijera ispred nestabilnog ljubavnog života. Tema za Carriene kolumne je i Faca, zgodni i misteriozni tajkun koji joj uvijek ubrza otkucaje srca. Kristin Davis, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon i Sarah Jessica Parker uče nas važne lekcije o seksu, ljubavi, muškim i ženskim tajnama, uspješnim i neuspješnim taktikama, ispunjenim očekivanjima, skrivenim strahovima. Kada su u pitanju muškarci, veze i odnosi, ne možemo a da se ne zapitamo - da li smo zaista naučili sve?

programme.title: Seks i grad
programme.desc: Možete pratiti jednu od najpopularnijih svjetskih serija"Seks i grad", koja prati živote četiri urbane žene i najbolje prijateljice iz New Yorka. Možete pratiti jednu od najpopularnijih svjetskih serija "Seks i grad", koja prati živote četiri urbane žene i najbolje prijateljice iz New Yorka u potrazi za ljubavlju, stabilnom vezom, razumjevanjem, seksom... Carrie Bradshaw je njujorška novinarka koja svoja opažanja o ljubavi i strasti objavljuje u kolumni "Seks i grad". Inspiracije joj ne nedostaje, jer sve što mora jeste saslušati svoje prijateljice dok joj se povjeravaju ili prepričavaju svoj posljednji izlazak. Uz nju su Samantha, vlasnica PR agencije, koja je na samačkoj sceni vidjela i isprobala sve, galeristica Charlotte koja još vjeruje da ljubav pobjeđuje sve i cinična Miranda, advokatica u velikoj kompaniji koja ima najmanje vremena za romanse, jer joj je karijera ispred nestabilnog ljubavnog života. Tema za Carriene kolumne je i Faca, zgodni i misteriozni tajkun koji joj uvijek ubrza otkucaje srca. Kristin Davis, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon i Sarah Jessica Parker uče nas važne lekcije o seksu, ljubavi, muškim i ženskim tajnama, uspješnim i neuspješnim taktikama, ispunjenim očekivanjima, skrivenim strahovima. Kada su u pitanju muškarci, veze i odnosi, ne možemo a da se ne zapitamo - da li smo zaista naučili sve?

Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1132290/","name":"Warehouse 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlY2I5Y2ItZTI1MC00MDM3LWI1MzEtMGU4ODFlOGUwNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nkuhn721"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"The show seems familiar to me.","reviewBody":"This comment may have been made already but, does anyone else see how much this show is a lot like Friday the 13th: The TV series? I loved that show when it was on so i'm really enjoying Warehouse 13 but i was curious if it was just me. Of course, the set up is different but the whole cursed objects and having to retrieve them is dead on. I do like the government connection since i was a big fan of X-files! Hopefully this show will win viewers and we will be able to keep another good one on the air for a change, i'm just sick of the reality shows for now. Anyway, I plan to continue watching since they really aren't any other good shows on at the moment."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50251,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. programme.title: Wynonna Earp
Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Wynonna Earp: With Melanie Scrofano, Tim Rozon, Dominique Provost-Chalkley, Katherine Barrell. Following Wyatt Earp's great great-granddaughter as she battles demons and other creatures. With her unique abilities and a posse of dysfunctional allies, she's the only thing that can bring the paranormal to justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4878326/","name":"Wynonna Earp","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDM1MGJhY2MtNjBhNC00Yzc0LWE5ZGUtNzY3MmNjOWE4YTM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Wyatt Earp's great great-granddaughter as she battles demons and other creatures. With her unique abilities and a posse of dysfunctional allies, she's the only thing that can bring the paranormal to justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4878326/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kitsune-25141"},"dateCreated":"2016-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gets better with time....","reviewBody":"I am really starting to like this series more and more as the actors start to get comfortable with their roles. The more I watch, the more I want to watch. I am enjoying watching the characters become more fleshed out. Sure there are some cheesy bits here and there, but as the series matures this gets better. The writing sort of reminds me of first season Buffy. I look forward to see where the story line is going. I really think that people need to give this series more of a chance, and not just judge the entire body of work based on the series premier. programme.desc: Warehouse 13: Created by Jane Espenson, D. Brent Mote. With Eddie McClintock, Joanne Kelly, Saul Rubinek, Allison Scagliotti. Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1132290/","name":"Warehouse 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlY2I5Y2ItZTI1MC00MDM3LWI1MzEtMGU4ODFlOGUwNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nkuhn721"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"The show seems familiar to me.","reviewBody":"This comment may have been made already but, does anyone else see how much this show is a lot like Friday the 13th: The TV series? I loved that show when it was on so i'm really enjoying Warehouse 13 but i was curious if it was just me. Of course, the set up is different but the whole cursed objects and having to retrieve them is dead on. I do like the government connection since i was a big fan of X-files! Hopefully this show will win viewers and we will be able to keep another good one on the air for a change, i'm just sick of the reality shows for now. Anyway, I plan to continue watching since they really aren't any other good shows on at the moment."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50251,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. programme.title: Godsend
Bogomdan
programme.desc:
Godsend: Directed by Nick Hamm. With Greg Kinnear, Rebecca Romijn, Robert De Niro, Cameron Bright. A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335121/","name":"Godsend","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzNzE3MTg5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTIxNDYwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rob_Taylor"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not one to see twice, even with the cloning element.","reviewBody":"I guess this film didn't really grip me. You knew from the start where the film was heading, but it seemed to take its sweet time about getting there. Perhaps that's why I found myself nodding off several times, only to be awoken by the obligatory, and repeated use of, shock tactics throughout the film.

I can't really think of anything positive to say about this film, but neither can I say anything greatly negative. It was neither good, nor bad. In fact, watching it was very much like being trapped in limbo. There was little to stimulate the audience's minds through most of the movie.

It's also irritating to see Hollywood moralising about the evils of cloning through the use of film. I'd hesitate to say it was right, but the last thing reasoned debate on the subject needs is idiot screenwriters cashing in on public fears (and fears that are generated by media misrepresentation, at that) and adding more fuel to the fire. What next, a movie about people turning into flies because they ate genetically modified food crops?

This film isn't very good and you won't be seeing it twice even if you do have the foolishness, like me, to watch it once. Lets just hope that this is one film that Hollywood decides NOT to clone in the future.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2004-11-24","keywords":"bare chested boy,barefoot boy,camera shot of bare feet,birthday,boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Godsend","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2410283289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgwYzhlMzEtOTAyNy00MzQyLTlmODMtNTA1YjYzODk1MTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgwYzhlMzEtOTAyNy00MzQyLTlmODMtNTA1YjYzODk1MTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001427/","name":"Greg Kinnear"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005381/","name":"Rebecca Romijn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358327/","name":"Nick Hamm"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024601/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005596/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093560/","name":"Mark Bomback"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bug
Kukci
programme.desc:
Bug: Directed by William Friedkin. With Ashley Judd, Michael Shannon, Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins. An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0470705/","name":"Bug","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzOTUzMDkzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDY2MjMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0470705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bad dream of a film","reviewBody":"BUG is a creepy psychological horror yarn directed by William Friedkin, the man behind such '70s classics as THE EXORCIST and THE FRENCH CONNECTION. Is this film in the same league as those films of yester-year? Not by a long shot. While the premise has a great deal of promise behind it, by the end this is a huge disappointment, a film that sacrifices disturbing realism for over-the-top theatrics by the climax, which is a real shame.

Theatrics is appropriate, as in the end this turns out to be adapted from a stage play, as evinced by the single-room setting. The first half is quirky and unusual, as we watch the film wondering how it's going to turn out. It flirts with a lot of themes and genres, without ever being easily pigeon-holed into a single one. Is it a psychological study of madness? Is it a creature feature horror flick? Is it a study of domestic violence, a romance, a two-hander character piece? It's all of those, but by the end the intense script falls apart and ends up tackling over-the-top sci-fi themes and becoming somewhat laughable.

One thing that does keep you watching is the calibre of the acting, which is top dollar. Ashley Judd is a fine piece of casting as the put-upon, run-down heroine, and she lends this film a sense of gravitas that would have otherwise been missing. Michael Shannon is a scene-stealer, his quirky, paranoid war veteran one of the most charming performances I've seen in the past few years, and there's a neat extended cameo from Harry Connick Jr, too.

The film has plenty of strong moments, a few bits of nasty violence, and a rather silly climax. It all mixes together into a rather unsatisfactory brew by the end, but hey, at least it's different.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34468,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-03-05","keywords":"breast sucking,power of suggestion,based on play,male frontal nudity,bare breasts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bug (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2126250265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGEzZDJjZjMtMzA4OC00ZGJmLWE2ZjgtYTc2OWI4NDcxYmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGEzZDJjZjMtMzA4OC00ZGJmLWE2ZjgtYTc2OWI4NDcxYmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Lionsgate"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000171/","name":"Ashley Judd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001065/","name":"Harry Connick Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001243/","name":"William Friedkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093132/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312746/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504832/","name":"Tracy Letts"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="
